channel.title: World MJER Iaido Federation
channel.description: Recent content on World MJER Iaido Federation

item.title: Shinsa2020@EsakaDojo Matsudo
item.description: November 22, 2020. We held the Shinsa 2020 at Esaka dojo Matsudo. Practice Opening ceremony. Written exam. Shinsa. Awards ceremony. Group photo. Other pics on here. World MJER Iaido Federation © 正統正流無雙直傳英信流居合道国際連盟

item.title: Notice Cancellation of The9th Taikai2020
item.description: Dear members. Due to concerns over the spread of Coronavirus(COVID-19), we regretfully announce the cancellation of The 9th Taikai2020. However, Shinsa (exam) will be held on November, 2020 at Matsudo Esaka Dojo. (If the condition of the coronavirus is similar to the present.) The deadline for application is September 30. Stay safe. World MJER Iaido Federation © 正統正流無雙直傳英信流居合

item.title: A Happy New Year2020
item.description: Dear members. New Year greetings from World MJER Iaido Federation. Last year we had many participants in “the 10th anniversary of the Federation” the 8th taikai. I appriciate it very much. We are all praying for your health and heartiness for in order to pass on the orthodox style of the Eishin Ryu Iaido style to future generations. Thank you. Chairman Esaka Hiroshi Seigen Representative Director Yoshioka Kazunari Cheif-Instructor Director

item.title: Ken Shin Dojo
item.description: Dear members, Introducing our new member dojo. 剣心道場 -Ken Shin Dojo- address : 5851 west boulevard, Kerrisdale Community Center Vancouver, BC Sensei : BAHMAN EBRAHIMI website : http://kenshindojo.ca/ The list of offical dojos is here. World MJER Iaido Federation © 正統正流無雙直傳英信流居合道国際連盟

item.title: Happy New Year2019
item.description: 謹 賀 新 年 Happy New Year!! 新年明けましておめでとうございます。 國際連盟もお陰様で第１０期目を迎えました。 会員諸剣士のご協力の賜物と役員一同感謝し、御礼申
